about_the_game:
The Ultimate Battle of Bites!

Step into the colorful chaos of Hungry, the action-packed multiplayer game where you're not just playing to win, you're playing to feast! Take control of a Boomble, a lively ball of energy with one mission: eat your way to victory. Gobble up orbs scattered across the map to grow in size and power. But be careful, if any of the other Boombles is bigger than you, they’ll swallow you whole!

In this high-stakes game of survival, strategy and speed are key. Outsmart opponents by navigating the map, collecting power-ups, and timing your attacks. Use clever maneuvers to dodge the giants and ambush smaller players to claim their points. The clock is ticking, and only the biggest, boldest Boomble will reign supreme when the timer hits zero.

As you dominate matches, you'll unlock exciting customization options, like flashy colors, quirky hats, and stylish accessories to give your Boomble personality. Whether you prefer a wizard look or a hilarious cowboy vibe, your Boomble will stand out as you conquer the leaderboard.

Hungry isn’t just a game, it’s a fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled competition where every bite counts. Will you rise to the top or get devoured trying? There’s only one way to find out: grab your Boomble, and let the feast begin!

name: Hungry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
